column4: I have a 1Gb lan card but it only has a 100 mbps setting, how can I fix it to 1Gb?
I have a 1Gb Realtek lan card but it only has a 100 mbps setting, how can I fix it to 1Gb?
I have a 1Gb Realtek lan card but it only has a 100 mbps setting, how can I fix it to 1Gb?
usually the NIC configures itself depending on what speed the port on the other side of the cable supports. so i'd guess the router is only 100 mbps.
